mapper.select: update INSBInvoiceinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime =NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},invoicetype = #{invoicetype},bankname = #{bankname},accountnumber = #{accountnumber},identifynumber = #{identifynumber},registerphone = #{registerphone},registeraddress = #{registeraddress},email = #{email} where id = #{id}

update INSBInvoiceinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime =NOW(),noti = #{noti},invoicetype = #{invoicetype},bankname = #{bankname},accountnumber = #{accountnumber},identifynumber = #{identifynumber},registerphone = #{registerphone},registeraddress = #{registeraddress},email = #{email}, inscomcode = #{inscomcode} where taskid = #{taskid}
